articles.title: Asian Development Bank Cuts India's GDP Forecast For 2022-23 To 7.2% - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Asian Development Bank (ADB) on Thursday trimmed India's economic growth forecast for current fiscal year to 7.2 per cent from 7.5 per cent as pandemic and war impact is weighing down alongside inflationary pressures.
articles.content:
India, however, will continue to surpass China.
